data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zaher, Hussam, Oliveira, Maria Ermelinda, Franco, Francisco Luís (2008): A new, brightly colored species of Pseudoboa Schneider, 1801 from the Amazon Basin (Serpentes, Xenodontinae). Zootaxa 1674: 27-37, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.180275
